text:
Name: Travis Liu
Headline: Software Engineer in Test @ RBC | Selenium • Test Automation • Kubernetes/OpenShift • ELK • Dynatrace
Location: Mississauga, Ontario, Canada (Hybrid)
About: Software Engineer in Test at RBC focused on building reliable, observable test automation for web and API services. I design and maintain Selenium-based UI/E2E suites, API testing frameworks, CI/CD quality gates, and cloud-native testing for services on OpenShift/Kubernetes. Previously at Seneca I contributed to the International Agents Portal and Academic Pathways projects and supported instructors/students as a Lab Assistant; I also served on the Seneca Student Federation Board.
Experience: • Software Engineer in Test — RBC (Permanent Full-time), Oct 2024–Present, Canada (Hybrid). • Software Developer — Seneca Polytechnic (Contract Full-time), May 2023–May 2024, North York (Hybrid). • Student Lab Assistant — Seneca Polytechnic, Jan 2023–May 2023. • Member, Board of Directors — Seneca Student Federation (Part-time), May 2023–May 2024.
Education: Seneca Polytechnic — Associate’s Degree, Computer Programming & Analysis (Jan 2022–Aug 2024), GPA 3.9; Coursework: Cloud Computing, Data Structures.
Skills: OpenShift, Kubernetes, Selenium, Test Automation, Test Engineering, Software Testing, API Testing, Web Testing, Test Methodologies, Dynatrace, Elastic Stack (ELK), Docker, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Amazon Web Services (AWS), REST APIs, React.js, Next.js, MongoDB, SQL/Databases, Nginx, OAuth, Jest, GitHub, .NET Framework, Python, C++, Swift, Xcode, Kotlin Coroutines, Server Administration, Troubleshooting, Documentation Practices, Project Management, DevOps.
Keywords: SDET, QA automation, CI/CD, observability, ELK, Dynatrace, Kubernetes, OpenShift, fintech, reliability, developer experience.
